name: Moles Voles and Trolls
description:
First Place Winner of the '21 WolverineSoft Turkey Game-Jam, the theme was "Making a Mountain out of a Molehill".

Dig for pieces to stack your tower as high as you can, but watch out for the trolls. if you let them touch your tower they'll knock it down. 

The dropper speeds up after every round, play on harder difficulties to make the dropper go even faster!

Go for a high score!

Credits
